text: int main ( ) { int t , n , a [ 101 ] [ 101 ] , sum [ 101 ] [ 10001 ] , max ; long long int k , i , j , p ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { max = - 1 ; k = 1 ; p = 1 ; sum [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = 0 ; a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } sum [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; if ( n < 2 ) { printf ( "%d\n" , sum [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } else { for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { p = p * 2 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < p ; j ++ ) { sum [ i ] [ j ] = sum [ i - 1 ] [ j / 2 ] + a [ i ] [ j / 2 ] ; if ( max < sum [ i ] [ j ] ) max = sum [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } } return 0 ; }
